name: TrashCade
description:
Hey ! 

This is my entry for the Kindred Community Game Jam, with the theme : "Death is a new beginning". I chose the approach of recycling to show  how objects, too, have a new beginning after their first life.

Please be forgiving, this is my very first game ! And many things din't come out the exact way I wanted. Because of school, i also really lacked time haha !

I somehow managed to create all the assets, sprites, music, code, etc.

I could not fix the issue with the trash cans color, and I'm sorry about that. The colors are, from left to right : blue, green, yellow.
